trans-unit.source: Represents a common dialog that allows the user to specify a filename to save a file as.
trans-unit.target: 代表通用對話方塊，可讓使用者指定另存新檔的檔名。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> cannot be used by an application that is executing under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任下執行的應用程式不能使用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" />。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog> for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog>如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ![Save As dialog box](~/add/media/dialogboxesoverviewfigure3.png "Save As dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![另存新檔 對話方塊](~/add/media/dialogboxesoverviewfigure3.png "另存新檔 對話方塊")

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 開啟和儲存檔案 對話方塊中，有**我的最愛連結**面板上，可讓使用者快速巡覽至不同的位置 對話方塊的左半部。

trans-unit.source: These links are called custom places.
trans-unit.target: 這些連結會呼叫自訂位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.CustomPlaces%2A> property to set this list of links.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.CustomPlaces%2A>屬性來設定這個連結清單。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog> and process the result.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog>及處理結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> prompts the user for permission to create a file if the user specifies a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如果使用者指定不存在的檔案，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> 是否會提示使用者提供建立檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if dialog should prompt prior to saving to a filename that did not previously exist; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果對話方塊應該在儲存原本不存在的檔名之前提示使用者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: to set this dialog option.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個對話方塊選項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a read-write file stream for the filename selected by the user using <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用者利用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> 選取的檔名，建立讀寫檔案資料流。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the selected file.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，其中包含選取的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file stream that is returned is opened with read-write access (<xref:System.IO.FileMode.Create> and <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite>).
trans-unit.target: 會傳回檔案資料流開啟具有讀寫存取權 (<xref:System.IO.FileMode.Create>和<xref:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite>)。

trans-unit.source: No files were selected in the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中未選取檔案。

trans-unit.source: to set this dialog option.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個對話方塊選項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> displays a warning if the user specifies the name of a file that already exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如果使用者指定已經存在的檔名，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> 是否會顯示警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if dialog should prompt prior to saving over a filename that previously existed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果對話方塊應該在覆寫原先已存在的檔名之前提示使用者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: to set this dialog option.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個對話方塊選項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Resets all <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 將所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog" /> 屬性重設為預設值。

trans-unit.source: to set this dialog option.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個對話方塊選項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: This class is sealed, so you cannot override this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別已密封，因此您無法覆寫這個方法。
